attributes.action: suggest a Knighthood for Mr Eric Patrick Clapton CBE
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This is a petition with the purpose of suggesting that Eric Clapton be knighted. The basis for this is not only his long career as an entertainer, spanning 5 decades but also his large amount of charity work. 

He has founded the Crossroads Rehabilitation Centre in Antigua- A dedicated centre to helping those with addictions. This has been running for 10 years this year.

Other charities that Mr Clapton has done work for include Amnesty International, Unicef and several relief charities set up after Hurricane Katrina to name but a few.

For these tireless efforts, and his role in bringing blues to new audiences for 50 years, I vote that Mr Clapton be knighted.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
